name: SUPER DISCO MIME
description:
Lance McVance. King of the Dance. Nobody can match him. Nobody can even come close.  He's been enjoying being on top... but  now...

THE MIME IS BACK.

If anybody can match Lance's moves, it's The Mime! Match his moves and prove to Lance that he isn't anything special. BY BEING EXACTLY LIKE HIM.
 

Just download the .exe and run!

CONTROLS -- arrow keys for the.. same... arrows. Yup. Good luck!
Press "Q" at any time to quit.

Ver 0.1b - polished what needed to be polished. Like uploading the game instead of an empty .exe file.
